attributes.action: Call on Cameron to suspend 26 Conservative MPs investigated for election fraud
attributes.background: 26 Conservative MPs are being investigated by the Election Commission over alledged fraud of undeclared spending in the 2015 General Elections and by-elections. Reports by Channel 4 suggest some of the expenses total tens of thousands of pounds and if declared they would go over the legal limit.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for suspending the MPs of any political party. That is a matter for individual political parties.
